abstract: Two Ukrainian policeman are injured in separate explosions at police stations in Lviv; incidents are linked to deadly weekend standoff between ultranationalist group Right Sector and police.
lead_paragraph: Two policemen were hurt Tuesday in explosions at two police stations in the western Ukrainian city of Lviv.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Ukraine: Blasts Target Police Stations

snippet: Two policemen were hurt Tuesday in explosions at two police stations in the western Ukrainian city of Lviv.
